page.title: 04More bye laws.
page.content:
People who visit the Forest must not:
-disturb or remove archeological or historical remains. -operate a metal detector. -set up or place any caravan ,tent ,booth or stall or erection of any kind including ecquestrian equipment. -permit any animal in his charge to be out of control. -permit a dog for which he is responsible to disturb ,worry or chase any bird or animal. -carry or use any firearms ,shot gun ,bow or any other missile or weapon. -operate any aircraft,hot-air balloon,boat,raft or any craft of any kind or model aircraft,boat or car.
